articles.title: 602,350 Americans died of cancer in 2020: CDC - Ahmedabad Mirror
articles.description:
A total of 602,350 people died of cancer in the US in 2020, but fatality rates due to the disease have continued to drop in the country, according to the US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC).
